36 dataRecording::dataRecording(string argument){
37  fileName += argument;
38  fileName += ".csv";
39 }

41 int dataRecording::openFile(){
42 
43  csvFile.open(fileName, ios::in | ios::app);
44  if (!csvFile.is_open()) {
45  cout << "Could not load CSV-File: " << fileName << endl;
46  cin.get();
47  return 0;
48  }
49 }
50 
51 void dataRecording::closeFile(){
52  csvFile.close();
53 }
54 
55 
56 int dataRecording::start(){
57  time_t now = time(NULL);
58  tm *ltm = localtime(&now);
59 
60  int year = 1900 + ltm->tm_year;
61  int month = 1 + ltm->tm_mon;
62  int day = ltm->tm_mday;
63  int hour = ltm->tm_hour;
64  int minute = ltm->tm_min;
65  int second = ltm->tm_sec;
66 
67  openFile();
68  csvFile << "\n" << year << "." << month << "." << day << " ";
69  csvFile << hour << ":" << minute << ":" << second << "; ";
70  closeFile();
71 }
72 
73 void dataRecording::writeSuccess(int usedNodes, long duration,std::chrono::duration<double> durationReal){
74  std::cout << std::endl << "duration: " << durationReal.count() << "s"<< std::endl;
75 
76  openFile();
77  csvFile << usedNodes << "; " << int(duration/60) << ":" << (duration%60) << "; ESCAPED; ";
78  csvFile << (long(durationReal.count())/60) << ":" << (long(durationReal.count())%60) <<";";
79  closeFile();
80 }
